main event: A round object, possibly a weather balloon, was observed in Richmond, Virginia on 21 April 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as being round on top and pointed at the bottom, comparable in size to a basket ball at arm's length,The object was light translucent silvery in color,It moved slowly to the east at a high altitude and gradually disappeared,Two telescopes were used to observe the object,One light aircraft was sent to investigate but reported negative results.
